name: Star_Cluster
description: You are the captain of a starship, exploring a Globular Cluster located at the core of the Milky Way. Legends tell of an object of infinite energy located here, dubbed “The Halo”. But you are not alone; you find yourself facing off against 3 other starships, each seeking The Halo, and each determined to be the first to find it, even if it means doing battle. Whoever survives the battle shall most likely be the legendary figure who found The Halo.
